description.value:
bug folk, eye brows extend into the antena; last joint/bone of finger is bifercated claw; semi-chitenous skin

Creature Type. You are a Humanoid.

Size. You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this species.

Speed. Your walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

Adaptive Carapace. While you are not wearing armor, your carapace gives you a base Armor Class of 13 + your Dexterity modifier. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your adaptive carapace.

As an action, you can change the color and, to an extent, the texture of your carapace to match your surroundings, giving you advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in those surroundings.

Broadcasting Antennae. You can communicate your thoughts and emotions telepathically to one willing creature within 120 feet of you. If the creature is not willing then they feel your attempts to convey your thoughts but receive nothing. A creature does not need to share a language with you to understands your thoughts, but must be able to understand at least one language. You can speak telepathically in this way to one creature at a time. Your telepathic broadcast to a creature is broken if you move more than 120 feet apart, if either of you of is incapacitated, or if either of you mentally break the contact (no action required).

Natural Hopper. Whenever you make a long jump or a high jump, you can increase the number of feet you cover by your proficiency bonus, even when making a standing jump. This extra distance costs movement as normal.

Secondary Arms. You have two slightly smaller secondary arms below your primary pair of arms. The secondary arms can manipulate an object, open or close a door or container, pick up or set down a Tiny object, or wield a weapon that has the light property.

Moreover, you can utilize your secondary arms in tandem with your primary arms to help your primary arms wield a shield that you do not meet the Strength requirement so your movement is not reduced, or weapons with two hands that do not have the heavy property.

advancement.title: INT Bonus
advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).
